trans-unit.source: "'O miserable of happy! Is this the end\nOf this new glorious world... ?'"\n—John Milton, *Paradise Lost*
trans-unit.target: "'O miserable of happy! Is this the end\nOf this new glorious world... ?'"\n—John Milton, *Paradise Lost*

trans-unit.source: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.
trans-unit.target: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

trans-unit.resname: G04·3 | Time Warp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

trans-unit.source: "Let's do it again!"\n—Squee, goblin cabin hand
trans-unit.target: "Let's do it again!"\n—Squee, goblin cabin hand

trans-unit.resname: G04·4 | Phyrexian Negator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
G04·4 | Phyrexian Negator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.

trans-unit.resname: G04·5 | Deranged Hermit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Echo {3}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
trans-unit.target: Echo {3}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

trans-unit.resname: G04·5 | Deranged Hermit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.

trans-unit.resname: G04·5 | Deranged Hermit | Card Text | Paragraph 3
G04·6 | Hermit Druid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.
trans-unit.target: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.
